long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chronic Save extends the native browser history with the function to search for keywords in texts and URLs of visited websites.
This speeds up the search for previously visited websites enormously.
In addition, Chronic Save offers various search filters that make it possible, among other things, to filter out specific website addresses and narrow down the search faster than before.
The aim of Chronic Save is to speed up the search for old websites and their content and make it as simple as possible.
Say goodbye to long and annoying searches.

In order to do its job, Chronic Save requires the following permissions:
-> Save permissions for texts, URLs, dates and titles of websites visited while browsing. This data is only saved locally on the user's computer and is not available to anyone other than the user.
-> The data is used exclusively for the purpose of keyword searches and serves no other purpose.
